text:
Hi everyone,
I need help regarding storing and capturing GCLID (referrer_url, utm_medium, utm_source) in google tag manager. In screenshot 1 : I have created these hidden fields. In screenshot 2 : I have created a GCLID script.

I am a bit confused how to track and store hidden fields defined in the HubSpot form in google tag manager. If any one has any idea then please let me know. Thank you!!

Hello,
is these API for getting ads  totals spending, ROI etc metrics from ads.
Just these fields values needs to be populated in the hidden form fields by gtm script when user click the ads

Hello
is it possible, if any contact added in my HubSpot  contact list, HubSpot will call me  straight that Mr X added in your list. If I missed the call it will automatically recall to my another number?
Hey has anyone ever set up an integration with QLM? Quick License Manager?
I did not, and unfortunately am no longer working on it
